DOC.brief_title: Quality of Life in Asthma and Rhinitis Allergic With Singulair (0476-365)
DOC.criteria: Establish diagnosis of mild to moderate chronic asthma and/or allergic rhinitis currently on treatment Voluntary acceptance to participate in the study Patients with cystic fibrosis Patients with known hypersensitivity to singulair or any of its components Patients with severe chronic asthma
